name: The House of E.
description:
The House of E. is a story-driven puzzle game with horror elements and a creepy atmosphere.

As you explore the darkest corners of the spooky mansion, you will collect items and solve riddles. Notes and newspaper pages will shed light on past events, and all combined will put you one step closer to discovering the truth. And in the end, you will have to decide not only about Emma’s fate.

The game has three different endings. Due to its length, there is no save option.



Although David and Emma Adams are siblings, they grew apart in time. But when the news of Emma's disappearance reaches David, he decides to do whatever is in his power to find her. Seeing the hopelessness of the local PD, he decides to take the matter into his own hands.

The trail leads him to the old mansion owned by a mystery horror novelist, who, as it turns out, also vanished without a trace. Believing those disappearances are not a coincidence, David goes to the manor.

He ventures into the unknown...


Movement: WSAD
Inventory: TAB
Flashlight: F
Combining items: drag item A to item B
Menu: ESC
Use item: E
Item info: Q
Skip dialogues: Space
